Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Troy
ShortDescription: #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, California, 31st, Pulaski and  26th, due to street blockage near 26th/Troy.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, California, 31st, Pulaski and  26th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 26th/Troy.

Allow extra travel time.
